/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The buildings lining the street are made of brick, their curved roofs adding a unique architectural element to the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. Power lines crisscross above the street, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of modernity to the traditional architecture. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their day, adding a human element to the urban landscape. The image is a beautiful blend of history and modernity, showcasing the vibrant city life in Beijing.
